content.rendered:
Convocation is an annual tradition celebrating the beginning of a new academic year and welcomes all students, faculty, and staff to the University of La Verne. It also calls together the campus community to honor traditions, ring the Spirit Bell, and join together as Leos.

Fall Convocation

2024 Fall Convocation will be held in-person on August 21, 2024 from 11:​50am-1:​00pm at the Sports Science Athletic Pavilion (SSAP Gym). Doors will open at 11:​30am and the event will be live-streamed.
